abstract:
The talk will explain why data science should embrace an engine for
processing cause-effect relationships. I will describe the structure of
this engine, how it has revolutionized the data-intensive sciences and
how it is about to revolutiones machine learning.
description:
The talk will explain why data science should embrace an engine for
processing cause-effect relationships. I will describe the structure of

title: Keynote #5: The New Science of Cause and Effect
